spec_data.Name: texlive-hausarbeit-jura
spec_data.Description:
The class was developed for use by students writing legal
essays ("juristische Hausarbeit") at German Universities. It is
based on jurabook and jurabib and makes it easy for LaTeX
beginners to get a correct and nicely formatted paper.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:09:36 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Class for writing "juristiche Hausarbeiten" at German Universities
